attributes.action: Change Our Parliament Protect Our Bullies
attributes.additional_details:
Not every dog is how it is portrayed. It’s never bad dogs it’s bad owners! Just banning one breed will just give all the back yard breeders more ammunition to breed or just to pick on another breed ie German Shepherds/Rotties 

Any dog can be trained badly in the wrong hands
attributes.background: Protect our Bully breeds it’s never the dog!!! It’s always the person who trains and makes the dog that way. Want to get many signatures to save our bullies

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Bad owners are to blame not the breed - don't ban the XL bully
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611
